mapper.select: SELECT `id` , `sys_type_id` , `typename` , `subject` , `brief` , `description` , `language` , `periodofvalidity` , `biztype` , `picture` , `cargonumber` , `amountonsale` , `retailprice` , `price` , `pricerange` , `skucode` , `supportonlinetrade` , `saletype` , `webSite` , `unit` , `isdelete` , `prison_id` , `source` , `sourceval` , `addtime` , `status` , `statusval` , `sendaddressId` , `sendaddresstext` , `packaging` , `user_id` , `serviceagency_id` , `price_region` , `issetmeal` , `billingtype` , `billingtypename` , `pricerange_one` , `pricerange_two` , `price_name` , `price_remark` , `buynum`, `object_id` FROM cm_shopping WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{data.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT `id` , `sys_type_id` , `typename` , `subject` , `brief` , `description` , `language` , `periodofvalidity` , `biztype` , `picture` , `cargonumber` , `amountonsale` , `retailprice` , `price` , `pricerange` , `skucode` , `supportonlinetrade` , `saletype` , `webSite` , `unit` , `isdelete` , `prison_id` , `source` , `sourceval` , `addtime` , `status` , `statusval` , `sendaddressId` , `sendaddresstext` , `packaging` , `user_id` , `serviceagency_id` , `price_region` , `issetmeal` , `billingtype` , `billingtypename` , `pricerange_one` , `pricerange_two` , `price_name` , `price_remark` , `buynum`, `object_id` FROM cm_shopping WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{data.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM cm_shopping WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT `id` , `sys_type_id` , `typename` , `subject` , `brief` , `description` , `language` , `periodofvalidity` , `biztype` , `picture` , `cargonumber` , `amountonsale` , `retailprice` , `price` , `pricerange` , `skucode` , `supportonlinetrade` , `saletype` , `webSite` , `unit` , `isdelete` , `prison_id` , `source` , `sourceval` , `addtime` , `status` , `statusval` , `sendaddressId` , `sendaddresstext` , `packaging` , `user_id` , `serviceagency_id` , `price_region` , `issetmeal` , `billingtype` , `billingtypename` , `pricerange_one` , `pricerange_two` , `price_name` , `price_remark` , `buynum`, `object_id` FROM cm_shopping WHERE 1=1 AND object_id = #{data.object_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
